result: Queesti√≥n 06) Emotional urgency if everything is for yesterday, if life engagese a first and shooting, if there is no more time for strategic stops, we fall fataly in the addiction of wanting that loves are also resolved in a second of second. We are in a hurry to hear "I love you." We can't wait for the convivial rules to be established: are we boyfriend, stay, married, lovers? Emotional urgency. A trap. We associate several words with love: passion, romance, sex, adrenaline, palpitations. We forget, however, of the word that enables this feeling: "patience." Love without patience does not avenge. Love cannot be chewed and swallowed with emergency, with despair hunger. It is a meal that can last a life.
